title.rendered: Official Ekurhuleni East FET College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Ekurhuleni East FET College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Ekurhuleni East FET College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Ekurhuleni East FET College based on the information provided within it.

Ekurhuleni East FET College Student Portal

Note: Ekurhuleni East FET College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Ekurhuleni East FET College Prospectus 2024

The Ekurhuleni East FET College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.eec.edu.za/.

Ekurhuleni East FET College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
